document.full_text: fox's plan to allow home viewing of some movies two months after they open will focus on films that have not realized their full potential in theaters, a studio executive said.
document.title: fox chief seeks to temper theater owners' furor over on-demand films
lines_and_colors: fox's plan to allow home viewing of some movies two months after they open will focus on films that have not realized their full potential in theaters, a studio executive said.
